item.title: Outcomes and Dissertation (Bachelor)
item.description:
Some of my outcomes and dissertation are here at the Bachelor.

My mentor is Huiquan Wang in my dissertation. He is the Associate Dean of the Faculty of Life Sciences in Tiangong University. This work was awarded the “Outstanding Final Destination Project of Tiangong University” because of its rich content (140 pages) and interesting practical work. My earliest papers date back to when I was a second-year at my Bachelorâ€™s university. I tried to do more as I assumed I would also do some research work in the future.

More information and documents: Available
